content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mining and storage at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-82.0) 
- Furnace (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) 
- Chest (position x=42.5, y=-83.5) for coal storage
- Burner inserter (position x=43.5, y=-80.5) for item transportation
- Chest (position x=44.5, y=-81.5) for item storage
- Chest (position x=45.5, y=-80.5) for item storage
- Chest (position x=43.5, y=-79.5) for item storage

### ERROR TIPS
* Errors when using extracting but being too far or when chest is full:
  - Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full before extracting items
  - Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
* Errors when furnace has no ingredients to smelt:
  - Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients before attempting to smelt
* Errors when inserter is waiting for source items:
  - Ensure the inserter has source items to pick up before attempting to transport items
* Errors when drill is out of fuel:
  - Ensure the drill has sufficient fuel before attempting to mine
* Errors when no iron ore in the inventory:
  - Ensure the inventory has iron ore before attempting to use it
* Errors when no burner mining drill in inventory:
  - Ensure the inventory has a burner mining drill before attempting to place it
* Errors when chest is empty:
  - Ensure the chest has items before attempting to extract from it
